original_title: La Queue Tigrée D'un Chat Comme Un Pendentif de Pare-Brise
overview: Difficult to say what this film is about. I know it is the product of much anger. Anger against TV, the media, cinema, politics, social, economy, history, finally a lot. Above all I wanted to stop making illusions.
title: La Queue Tigrée D'un Chat Comme Un Pendentif de Pare-Brise
